00006 void
00007 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::ctor(SgAsmElfNoteSection *section)
00008 {
00009     ROSE_ASSERT(section->get_entries()!=NULL);
00010     section->get_entries()->get_entries().push_back(this);
00011     ROSE_ASSERT(section->get_entries()->get_entries().size()>0);
00012     set_parent(section->get_entries());
00013 
00014     p_name = new SgAsmBasicString("");
00015     p_name->set_parent(this);
00016 }

00026 void
00027 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::set_name(SgAsmGenericString *name)
00028 {
00029     if (name!=p_name) {
00030         if (p_name) {
00031             p_name->set_parent(NULL);
00032             SageInterface::deleteAST(p_name);
00033         }
00034         p_name = name;
00035         if (p_name)
00036             p_name->set_parent(this);
00037         set_isModified(true);
00038     }
00039 }

00042 void
00043 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::set_payload(const void *_buf, size_t nbytes)
00044 {
00045     const unsigned char *buf = (const unsigned char*)_buf;
00046     p_payload.clear();
00047     p_payload.reserve(nbytes);
00048     for (size_t i=0; i<nbytes; i++)
00049         p_payload.push_back(buf[i]);
00050 }

00054 rose_addr_t
00055 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::parse(rose_addr_t at)
00056 {
00057     /* Find the section holding this note */
00058     SgAsmElfNoteSection *notes = SageInterface::getEnclosingNode<SgAsmElfNoteSection>(this);
00059     ROSE_ASSERT(notes!=NULL);
00060     ROSE_ASSERT(at < notes->get_size());
00061     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = dynamic_cast<SgAsmElfFileHeader*>(notes->get_header());
00062     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00063     
00064     /* Length of note entry name, including NUL termination */
00065     uint32_t u32;
00066     notes->read_content_local(at, &u32, 4);
00067     size_t name_size = disk_to_host(fhdr->get_sex(), u32);
00068     at += 4;
00069 
00070     /* Length of note entry description (i.e., the payload) */
00071     notes->read_content_local(at, &u32, 4);
00072     size_t payload_size = disk_to_host(fhdr->get_sex(), u32);
00073     at += 4;
00074 
00075     /* Type of note */
00076     notes->read_content_local(at, &u32, 4);
00077     unsigned type = disk_to_host(fhdr->get_sex(), u32);
00078     at += 4;
00079 
00080     /* NUL-terminated name */
00081     std::string note_name = notes->read_content_local_str(at);
00082     ROSE_ASSERT(note_name.size()+1 == name_size);
00083     at += name_size;
00084     at = (at+3) & ~0x3; /* payload is aligned on a four-byte offset */
00085 
00086     /* Set properties */
00087     get_name()->set_string(note_name);
00088     set_type(type);
00089     p_payload = notes->read_content_local_ucl(at, payload_size);
00090 
00091     return at + payload_size;
00092 }
00093 
00096 rose_addr_t
00097 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::unparse(std::ostream &f, rose_addr_t at)
00098 {
00099     /* Find the section holding this note */
00100     SgAsmElfNoteSection *notes = SageInterface::getEnclosingNode<SgAsmElfNoteSection>(this);
00101     ROSE_ASSERT(notes!=NULL);
00102     ROSE_ASSERT(at < notes->get_size());
00103     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = dynamic_cast<SgAsmElfFileHeader*>(notes->get_header());
00104     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr!=NULL);
00105 
00106     /* Name size, including NUL termination */
00107     uint32_t u32;
00108     host_to_disk(fhdr->get_sex(), p_name->get_string().size()+1, &u32);
00109     notes->write(f, at, 4, &u32);
00110     at += 4;
00111 
00112     /* Payload size */
00113     host_to_disk(fhdr->get_sex(), p_payload.size(), &u32);
00114     notes->write(f, at, 4, &u32);
00115     at += 4;
00116     
00117     /* Type */
00118     host_to_disk(fhdr->get_sex(), p_type, &u32);
00119     notes->write(f, at, 4, &u32);
00120     at += 4;
00121     
00122     /* Name with NUL termination and padded to a multiple of four bytes */
00123     std::string name = p_name->get_string();
00124     while ((name.size()+1) % 4)
00125         name += '\0';
00126     notes->write(f, at, name.size()+1, name.c_str());
00127     at += name.size()+1;
00128     
00129     /* Payload */
00130     notes->write(f, at, p_payload);
00131     at += p_payload.size();
00132     
00133     return at;
00134 }
00135 
00137 rose_addr_t
00138 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::calculate_size() const {
00139     rose_addr_t need = 12;                           /*namesize, payloadsize, type*/
00140     need += p_name->get_string().size() + 1;    /*name plus NUL terminator*/
00141     need = (need+3) & ~0x3;                     /*pad to align payload on a four-byte offset */
00142     need += p_payload.size();
00143     return need;
00144 }
00145 
00147 void
00148 SgAsmElfNoteEntry::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00149 {
00150     char p[4096];
00151     if (idx>=0) {
00152         sprintf(p, "%sElfNoteEntry[%zd]", prefix, idx);
00153     } else {
00154         sprintf(p, "%sElfNoteEntry", prefix);
00155     }
00156     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00157 
00158     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s \"%s\"\n", p, w, "name", p_name->get_string(true).c_str());
00159     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s %u\n", p, w, "type", p_type);
00160     if (p_payload.size()>0) {
00161         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu bytes\n", p, w, "extra", p_payload.size());
00162         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"extra at ", p_payload);
00163     }
00164 }

00167 void
00168 SgAsmElfNoteSection::ctor()
00169 {
00170     p_entries = new SgAsmElfNoteEntryList;
00171     p_entries->set_parent(this);
00172 }
00173 
00174 /* Parse existing notes */
00175 SgAsmElfNoteSection *
00176 SgAsmElfNoteSection::parse()
00177 {
00178     SgAsmElfSection::parse();
00179 
00180     rose_addr_t at=0;
00181     while (at < get_size()) {
00182         SgAsmElfNoteEntry *note = new SgAsmElfNoteEntry(this);
00183         at = note->parse(at);
00184     }
00185     return this;
00186 }
00187 
00189 bool
00190 SgAsmElfNoteSection::reallocate()
00191 {
00192     bool reallocated = SgAsmElfSection::reallocate();
00193     
00194     /* How much space is needed by the notes? */
00195     rose_addr_t need = 0;
00196     for (size_t i=0; i<p_entries->get_entries().size(); i++) {
00197         SgAsmElfNoteEntry *ent = p_entries->get_entries()[i];
00198         need += ent->calculate_size();
00199     }
00200 
00201     /* Adjust the section/segment size */
00202     if (need < get_size()) {
00203         if (is_mapped()) {
00204             ROSE_ASSERT(get_mapped_size()==get_size());
00205             set_mapped_size(need);
00206         }
00207         set_size(need);
00208         reallocated = true;
00209     } else if (need > get_size()) {
00210         get_file()->shift_extend(this, 0, need-get_size(), SgAsmGenericFile::ADDRSP_ALL, SgAsmGenericFile::ELASTIC_HOLE);
00211         reallocated = true;
00212     }
00213     
00214     return reallocated;
00215 }

00218 void
00219 SgAsmElfNoteSection::unparse(std::ostream &f) const
00220 {
00221     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = get_elf_header();
00222     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr);
00223 
00224     rose_addr_t at = 0;
00225     for (size_t i=0; i<p_entries->get_entries().size(); i++) {
00226         SgAsmElfNoteEntry *ent = p_entries->get_entries()[i];
00227         at = ent->unparse(f, at);
00228     }
00229 }

00233 void
00234 SgAsmElfNoteSection::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00235 {
00236     char p[4096];
00237     if (idx>=0) {
00238         sprintf(p, "%sElfNoteSection[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00239     } else {
00240         sprintf(p, "%sElfNoteSection.", prefix);
00241     }
00242 
00243     SgAsmElfSection::dump(f, p, -1);
00244 
00245     for (size_t i=0; i<p_entries->get_entries().size(); i++) {
00246         SgAsmElfNoteEntry *ent = p_entries->get_entries()[i];
00247         ent->dump(f, p, i);
00248     }
00249 }
